definition: to defer payment/to pay back over long term
a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]
to pay/to hand over to/classifier for pairs or sets of things
section/paragraph/funds/CL:筆|笔[bi3],個|个[ge4]/classifier for versions or models (of a product)

sentences.english: He compounded with his creditor for a postponement of payment.
sentences.chinese: 他与债权人达成协定延期付款。

sentences.english: and note with due attention your request
sentences.chinese: 也及时注意到你们延期付款的请求。

sentences.english: We ca am #39;t accept payment on deferred terms.
sentences.chinese: 我们不能接受延期付款。

sentences.english: We may accept deferred payment if the quantity is over 3,000 sets.
sentences.chinese: 如果数量超过3000套，我们可以接受延期付款。

sentences.english: We'll give you a time extension to pay.
sentences.chinese: 我们会给你一段时间延期付款。
延期付款基础上的服务。

sentences.english: An integrated cooperative inventory model with partially permissible delay in payments was studied.
sentences.chinese: 针对存在部分延期付款的一体化库存模型展开研究。

sentences.english: We can‘t accept payment on deferred terms.
sentences.chinese: 我们不能接受延期付款。

sentences.english: He compounded with his creditors for a postponement of payment.
sentences.chinese: 他与债权人达成协议延期付款。

sentences.english: A standard of deferred payment, and a store of value.
sentences.chinese: 延期付款的标准和价值的储存手段。

pinyin: bu4 ke3 che4 xiao1 xin4 yong4 zheng4

definition: to present (a bill of exchange etc) for payment
to accept (i.e. acknowledge as calling for payment) (commerce)/to honor (a check, a promise)
